title: D-Day From the Bird's Eye Perspective (Full Documentary)
description: Comprehensive animated overview of the entire D-Day operation from a strategic bird's eye perspective, featuring animated maps showing troop movements and beach landings.

title: D-Day Invasion or Operation Overlord: History, Timelines and Map
description: Concise animated overview of Operation Overlord with clear map-based visualizations showing the invasion timeline and beach locations.

title: The Battle of Carentan, Normandy 1944 - Animated
description: Detailed animated reconstruction of the Battle of Carentan, showing the 101st Airborne Division's operations to link Utah and Omaha beachheads.

title: D-Day from the German Perspective
description: Detailed documentary examining D-Day from the German military perspective, including their fortified defenses and the challenges they faced.

title: D-Day But From Nazi Perspective
description: Animated infographic detailing the Nazi military's actions and strategic miscalculations leading up to the invasion.

title: D-DAY: THE TAKING OF OMAHA BEACH
description: The U.S. prepares to invade Nazi Germany in one of the most dangerous confrontations of WWII. From D-Day in HD.

title: The 32 Men Who Unlocked Omaha Beach
description: The remarkable story of the US 1st Infantry Division soldiers who emerged from their landing craft at Bloody Omaha.

title: D-Day Minus One | 101st Airborne Film
description: U.S. Army Air Forces Special Film documenting the operations of the 82nd and 101st Airborne Divisions. Restored HD footage from 1945.

title: The Battle For Pegasus Bridge: How 181 Men Opened The Way For D-Day
description: Documentary recounting the daring pre-D-Day glider assault on two vital Normandy bridges in Operation Deadstick.

title: The First Airborne Assault on D-Day
description: Documentary about the 2nd Battalion Ox & Bucks Light Infantry capturing Pegasus Bridge - the first Allied victory on D-Day.

title: D-Day At Pointe-Du-Hoc | Full Documentary
description: The remarkable story of the U.S. Army's 2nd Ranger Battalion scaling the cliffs at Pointe du Hoc on D-Day.

title: US Army Rangers at Pointe du Hoc - D-Day Landings
description: Detailed animated account of the Rangers' assault climbing the 100-foot cliffs at Pointe du Hoc under enemy fire.

title: The Greatest Deception of WW2: Operation Fortitude
description: How the Allies fooled Hitler with fake armies, inflatable tanks, and double agents in the greatest deception operation of the war.

title: D-Day 2: The Secret War | WW2 | Extra History
description: Covers Operation Bodyguard - the deception to make Germans think the invasion would be at Pas de Calais.

title: The Floating Harbors of D-Day
description: Detailed engineering explanation of the Mulberry Harbor construction - the incredible feat of building portable harbors.

title: Hobart's Funnies | The Strange Tanks of Operation Overlord
description: Comprehensive coverage of the specialized D-Day tanks: Sherman DD, Sherman Crab, AVRE, and Churchill Crocodile.

title: The Unrivalled Courage Of The French Resistance
description: Documentary covering the French Resistance movement during WW2 and their courageous efforts against Nazi occupation.

title: D-Day 3: La Resistance | WW2 | Extra History
description: Although the French government surrendered, French people continued to resist. Part of the D-Day Great Crusade series.
